price: Allah vam naređuje da više nikad takvo nešto ne ponovite, ako ste vjernici,
arabic: يَعِظُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَن تَعُودُواْ لِمِثۡلِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yaʿiẓukumu al-lahu an taʿūdū limith'lihi abadan in kuntum mu'minīna
